name: PauseMenuLoop
description: Loops a song of your choice in the pause menu.

configdir.name: Click me to open the Config Directory!
configdir.desc:
<cy>(Hopefully.)</c>
This setting does literally nothing new except being a button that acts as a shortcut to open the config directory for this mod (which is kind of important for using this mod properly, because this is where you will store your custom end level screen splash texts), because the legendary developers in the Geode Team themselves forgot to add a shortcut button that would have done this exact same thing, and I have gotten far too many folks (rightfully) asking me to find the config directory when using some of my other mods, and I hate repeating the same things over and over again, and I don't know if the next major update for Geode will also repeat this mistake where HJfod forgets to include a config directory shortcut button, so this setting and this button are here for extra insurance, so please enjoy this extra button, I guess. Anyway, by the time you're finished reading this, your device should be finished with opening the config directory; press "Aight" to close this window.

file.name: Pause Menu Loop
file.description: Choose an audio file to loop.

folder.name: Other Folder of Pause Menu Loops
folder.description: Choose a second folder (besides the mod's config folder) containing audio files for looping.

random.name: Choose Random Loop
random.description: Allows the mod to choose a menu loop randomly <cy>from the mod's config directory</c>. Click on the little pencil in the mod's info layer <cl>(preferably without Mega Hack loaded)</c> to find this directory.

volume.name: Volume (%)
volume.description: Set the volume of your pause menu loop (as a percentage).

muffle.name: Muffle Filter
muffle.description:
<cl>Original code adapted from Undefined's EditorMusic mod.</c>

Enables a low-pass audio filter for a "muffle" effect. Useful when playing copyrighted songs while streaming to internet audiences.

muffleStrength.name: Muffle Filter Strength
muffleStrength.description: Set the strength of the muffle filter. Go experiment! (The higher this value, the stronger the filter.)

reduction.name: Volume Reduction (Multiplier)
reduction.description: Sets a multiplier to reduce the volume of your pause menu loop. Useful for folks trying to hit that sweet spot of decibel levels.
